docs.text: Lighting Talk GitHub や Twitter では、不十分なところを補っていきたいと思います。 Python Code 01 Tip ヒントです。 1 2 3 4 5 6 """ Bubble sort """ def bubble_sort ( items ): for i in range ( len ( items )): for j in range ( len ( items ) - 1 - i ): if items [ j ] > items [ j + 1 ]: items [ j ], items [ j + 1 ] = items [ j + 1 ], items [ j ] Python Code 02 Tip ヒントです。 1 2 3 4 5 6 """ Bubble sort """ def bubble_sort ( items ): for i in range ( len ( items )): for j in range ( len ( items ) - 1 - i ): if items [ j ] > items [ j + 1 ]: items [ j ], items [ j + 1 ] = items [ j + 1 ], items [ j ]
